Summary: a round white llight 800 miles per hour north to south parallel to the ground
divs: Sighting DetailsI am a truck driver. I had just got fuel at the pilot truck stop at exit 406 interstate 20. My logbook concurs the time. The fuel card would be even more exact. I left immediately after getting fuel Im headed east on I 20 toward my destination. which was our yard in fort worth. The sky was clear. No heavy traffic. ........... about a mile east of exit 406 a bright white light caught my eye. It was coming in from the north Traveling south. At first of course I thought it was a meteor. I thought heck, I never have a wish prepared, to wish upon a falling star. But it didn't burn out. It kept going. It didn't diminish. And I thought " god help ne think of a good wish" Then I said to myself. "HOLY ______"***" Is that?? OMG!! IT WAS ABOUT TO GO OUT VIEW BY NOW. It took me 30 seconds to get to the part of the freeway where it crossed. I was traveling 60 miles per hour. I've been driving for 16 years. I have seen a lot of stuff in the skies. But never anything like this. I am very good at estimating speeds And distances. I have excellent depth perception. My opinion is It was traveling about 800 miles per hour. In a straight line parallel to the ground. 500 to 1000 feet off the ground. And then it was gone. When I got to the point where I believed it crossed. I looked south and saw nothing. That was not a rock burning up in the atmosphere. A few minutes later. I posted on news channel 25 out of waco texas facebook my experience. That's how convinced I am. What ever it was. Was real. THATS WHAT I SAW. THATS WHAT I BELIEVE. EAIT TILL YOU SEE ONE... YOU WILL BE ON THIS SITE ALSO..
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Weatherford
There were no other sightings in Weatherford on or around October 6th 2011
